film.title: Tango and Cash
film.summary: Framed by their ruthless arch-nemesis, a mismatched LAPD crime-fighting duo has to put its differences aside to even the score with the evil kingpin who put them behind bars once and for all.

guestOne.name: Nick Kroll
guestOne.bio: Nick Kroll is dearly beloved here at Earwolf, in case you can’t tell from the El Chupcabra tag on the Earwolf theme. He’s a quick improviser and hilarious stand-up, and you can watch his special Thank You Very Cool or the semi-improvised The League for verification on that. His credits are unending, and incredibly impressive.

results.episodeDescription: Nick Kroll breaks the return guest record as he joins Paul, June, and Jason to discuss Stallone & Russell as mismatched cops in Tango & Cash. They'll cover everything from cross dressing Kurt Russell, Jack Palance's master plan, 80s boobs, the newspaper headlines, and the will they, won’t they high-five relationship Sly & Kurt share onscreen. Plus, we find out if the ladies out there really do enjoy Stallone & Russell’s shower scene during 2nd Opinions!
